name: formexa
description: Production-ready AI SaaS platform with PayPal subscriptions

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint

author: Formexa Team
